articles.title: Val Kilmer on the Tom Cruise 'Top Gun: Maverick' reunion, that final hug: 'Straight from the heart' - USA TODAY
articles.description: Val Kilmer and Tom Cruise reunite in "Top Gun: Maverick." The reunion was emotional with the hug "straight from the heart," Kilmer tells USA TODAY.
articles.content:
"Top Gun: Maverick" has thrilled record-breaking theater audiences with jet action and throwbacks to the original  "Top Gun."
